faqs.question: What types of documentation do you create?
faqs.answer: We create a wide range of technical documentation including user guides, API references, developer documentation, system architecture documents, installation guides, troubleshooting guides, and knowledge bases. We tailor our approach to your specific audience and requirements.

faqs.question: How do you ensure documentation stays up-to-date?
faqs.answer: We implement documentation-as-code practices, integrating documentation into your development workflow. This includes version control, automated testing, and continuous integration. We can also establish maintenance processes and schedules for regular reviews and updates.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing documentation?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can audit, improve, and expand your existing documentation. We'll identify gaps, inconsistencies, and opportunities for enhancement, then develop a plan to bring your documentation up to standard while maintaining consistency.

faqs.question: What formats do you deliver documentation in?
faqs.answer: We can deliver documentation in various formats including web-based documentation portals, PDFs, interactive guides, videos, and embedded help systems. The format depends on your users' needs and how they prefer to consume information.
